content.text1: Easter is a celebration of hope and new life, but we can’t forget that this story begins in the crucifixion and the feelings of loss and unknown for the disciples. Join us as we journey from the sacrifice of Good Friday, through the unknown of Holy Saturday, and into the new hope of Easter Sunday.

Good Friday is a unique time to reflect on the way that God is with us in the middle of the hard and heavy seasons of our lives. When we skip over or avoid being present in these spaces where our lives intersect with death, we also miss out on the way God wants to meet us there with his faithful gift of new life.

calendar.description: Join The Meeting House's livestream on Good Friday.

content.text1: The first Holy Saturday was full of agonizing unknowns. What did Jesus' human peers do with that? Join us as we share musings around when we find ourselves in the middle of a story where the end is not known.

content.text1: This Easter we share how Jesus’ resurrection gives us hope, a story, and a future. We hope you join us as we share in the story that changed everything and what that means for us today.
